definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: So purification of less volatile components.
The method of aluminum purification becomes the key to HPA development.
sentences.chinese: 铝提纯工艺为高纯铝发展的关键。

sentences.english: The enzyme has been partially purified from muny bean shoots.
sentences.chinese: 从绿豆幼苗中已部分地提纯了这种酶。

sentences.english: Preparative HPLC refers to the process of isolation and purification of compounds.
sentences.chinese: 最初的HPLC指的是化合物的分离和提纯过程。

sentences.english: Multi-walled carbon nanotubes are purified by an improved wet-chemical method.
sentences.chinese: 采用改进的湿化学方法提纯多壁碳纳米管。

sentences.english: The virus was purified and antiserum was prepared by immunized rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 提纯获得了纯化病毒，并免疫家兔制备出抗血清。

sentences.english: Apparently, the enzymes in the Civet’s stomach remove some of the bitter coffee taste.
sentences.chinese: 显然，麝香猫胃里的酶提纯了咖啡的苦味。

sentences.english: A method of purifying ZnSO4 by ion exchange resin is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文描述了利用离子交换树脂提纯硫酸锌的方法。

sentences.english: The result showed, rarefied flavonoid from Chinese olive sure have antioxygenic activity.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，提纯的青橄榄黄酮具有一定的抗氧化活性。

sentences.english: The crystal protein was extracted, purified and tested.
sentences.chinese: 并对其晶体蛋白进行了提纯和测定。

sentences.english: Purification of 2,6 dichlorotoluene by the recrystallization method without solvent was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用无溶剂重结晶法提纯2，6二氯甲苯。

sentences.english: Viroid is small and exists less in host, which is difficult to purify.
sentences.chinese: 类病毒分子量小，在寄主体内含量低，不易提纯。

sentences.english: From here to here. And you can purify.
sentences.chinese: 从这倒这，我就可以提纯。

sentences.english: Do your distillation under high pressure or low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 在高压或低压下进行提纯。

sentences.english: After being filtered, the solution must be purified and concentrated .
sentences.chinese: 溶液滤出后，必须提纯并浓缩。

definition: to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
